div.div:
This diagram shows solution uses CloudWatch, SNS, to help monitor and troubelshoot Lambda:
1. A lambda function is invoked by an event or a schedule
2.A lambda function automatically sends execution data to CloudWatch
3.Â CloudWatch initailizes a unique log group for each Lambda function and creates a log stream for each execution, capturing function outputs, errors and performance details.
4. Metric filters can be created and applied against a CloudWatch log group to scan logs for specific error patterns or keywoards, such as errors or exceptions
5. A CloudWatch alarm is configured to monitor the metric filters and check if they exceed a predefined threshold
6. If the threshold is exceeded, the CloudWatch goes into ALARM state , signaling that an issue has occured and invoking a notification through SNS
7 The notification publishes a message to SNS topic and notifies all support personel who are subscribers to the topic.
8. As the complexity of the Lambda function grows, additional metrics filters and alarm can be added to capture and help resolve other erros.

switch.text: This diagram shows solution uses CloudWatch, SNS, to help monitor and troubelshoot Lambda:...
